article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Handheld Targeting Devices
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Guidance and Electronics Co., Apopka, Fla., was awarded a $9,245,586 firm-fixed-price contract for handheld precision targeting device systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity.
